item.title: Parkin Ginger Cake
item.description: Ingredients 12oz golden syrup 6oz butter or baking margarine 8oz black treacle 13oz oats 3 eggs 7oz self-raising flour 9oz dark brown sugar 3 tsp milk 3 tsp ginger powder Method Mix together the golden syrup, butter and black treacle. Pop them in the microwave for two minutes to loosen up. Pour the mixture into a large bowl of oats, and stir. Add the remaining ingredients (eggs, flour, sugar, milk and ginger powder) and mix well.
